title: World's Best Sweet Potato Pound Cake

Ingredients.1: 0.5 cup unsalted butter, softened, plus additional for greasing bundt pan

Ingredients.6: 1.0 cups sweet potatoes, baked, cooled, and pureed

Ingredients.7: 3 cups cake flour, plus more for dusting

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease and flour a 10-inch Bundt or tube pan.

Directions.2: Cream butter and Neufchatel cream cheese in a stand mixer until creamy. Add both types of sugar and continue to beat until fluffy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Mix in sweet potato puree until well incorporated.

Directions.3: Combine cake flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, nutmeg, ginger, and salt in a bowl. Slowly add flour mixture to sweet potato mixture; mix until well combined. Beat in vanilla extract. Fill batter into prepared baking pan.

Directions.4: Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted in center comes out clean, 75 to 85 minutes. Let cool in pan for 20 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack and cool completely.
